upgrade.BackupDesc: Click "Generate archive" to download a tar archive of the current configuration files. To reset the firmware to its initial state, click "Perform reset" (only possible with squashfs images).
upgrade.RestoreDesc: To restore configuration files, you can upload a previously generated backup archive here.
upgrade.UpgradeDesc: Upload a sysupgrade-compatible image here to replace the running firmware. Check "Keep settings" to retain the current configuration (requires an OpenWrt compatible firmware image).
upgrade.PerformResetContent: This will reset the system to its initial configuration, all changes made since the initial flash will be lost!
upgrade.backup archive was uploaded completely: The backup archive was uploaded completely. Please verify the checksum and file size below, then click "{btn}" to restore the archive.
upgrade.RestoreConfirm: The backup was successfully restored, it is advised to reboot the system now in order to apply all configuration changes.
upgrade.RestoreFail: Backup restoration failed, Make sure that you choose the file format for your platform.
upgrade.The firmware image was uploaded complete: The firmware image was uploaded completely. Please verify the checksum and file size below, then click "{btn}" to start the flash procedure.
upgrade.InvalidImageContent: The uploaded image file does not contain a supported format. Make sure that you choose the generic image format for your platform.
